com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget
Interface IconSupport

All Known Implementing Classes:
Button, ButtonGroup, CheckMenuItem, CollapsePanel, ContentPanel, Dialog, FormPanel, Header, Info, MenuItem, Portlet, QuickTip, RowEditor, Shortcut, SplitButton, TabItem, TabItem.HeaderItem, Tip, ToggleButton, ToolTip, Window
public interface IconSupport

Interface for objects that support icons. To create AbstractImagePrototypes from image paths and CSS style names, see @link IconHelper.

See Also:
IconHelper
